manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description The RAM-B-201U consists of a medium double socket arm that accommodates 1" B size ball bases, device holders, and adapters. With an overall length 3.73", this is the standard RAM double socket arm size. The easy to adjust knob allows for near-infinite adjustability for your connected device.

Technical Specifications Part Number RAM-B-201U Product Dimensions Overall Length: 3.73" Socket-to-Socket Length 3" Ball/Socket Size B Size (1") Weight Capacity Standard Use: 2 lbs, Heavy-Duty Use: 1 lb Materials Marine-grade aluminum Packaging Type Poly Bag Weight 0.31 lbs.

RAM Double Socket Arm Short RAM Double Socket Arm Short Composite RAM Double Socket Arm Medium RAM Double Socket Arm Medium Composite RAM Double Socket Arm Long Material Metal Hard Composite Metal Hard Composite Metal Weight 0.21 lbs. 0.15 lbs. 0.31 lbs. 0.25 lbs. 0.53 lbs. Socket-to-Socket Length 1.75" 1.75" 3" 3" 5.31" Overall Length 2.42" 2.42" 3.73" 3.73" 6"

B Size Components All B Size Ball components accommodate 1" diameter B Size sockets Common Mounts Using B Size: - Phone Mounting - GoPro Mounting - GPS Mounting C Size Components All C Size Ball components accommodate 1.5" diameter C Size sockets Common Mounts Using C Size: - Tablet Mounting - Laptop Mounting - Small/Medium Sized Fishfinders D Size Components All D Size Ball components accommodate 2.25" diameter D Size sockets Common Mounts Using D Size: - Large Fishfinders/Chartplotters - TV Mounting and Large Monitors - Forklift Mounting Solutions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RAM Mounts RAM-B-201U Double Socket Arm (Medium)
reviews.reviewText: The RAM Mounts RAM-B-201U Double Socket Arm (Medium) proved to be an indispensable companion during the rigorous Cannonball Scooter Race across America. This review highlights its exceptional performance, meeting every requirement and flawlessly supporting our journey.When it comes to endurance races, equipment reliability is paramount. The RAM-B-201U Double Socket Arm left no room for disappointment. With its robust construction and unwavering stability, it proved itself as a dependable choice for securely mounting accessories to our scooters.From the very start, the RAM-B-201U exceeded expectations. Its medium-sized double socket arm struck the perfect balance between flexibility and stability. It allowed us to adjust our accessories to optimal positions while maintaining steadfast support, a crucial factor during a race that demands adaptability and precision.The demanding terrain of the Cannonball Scooter Race exposed our gear to intense vibrations, jolts, and shifts. Yet, the RAM-B-201U Double Socket Arm held strong, showcasing its exceptional build quality. This arm effortlessly absorbed shocks and vibrations, providing a steady platform for our accessories, even as we faced unpredictable road conditions.One of the standout features of the RAM-B-201U was its versatile compatibility. It seamlessly accommodated a wide range of accessories, from GPS devices to smartphone mounts, ensuring that our navigation and communication tools were easily accessible throughout the race. This adaptability significantly streamlined our experience and contributed to our overall performance.Installation and adjustments were a breeze, allowing us to focus on the race itself rather than struggling with our equipment. The intuitive design of the RAM-B-201U Double Socket Arm ensured that we could fine-tune our setup on the fly, enhancing our efficiency and minimizing downtime.In a race where every second counts, the RAM-B-201U emerged as a game-changer. Its flawless performance and unyielding reliability met our demands head-on, allowing us to navigate and communicate seamlessly while conquering challenging terrains.In conclusion, the RAM Mounts RAM-B-201U Double Socket Arm (Medium) delivered an exceptional experience during the Cannonball Scooter Race across America. Its robust construction, adaptability, and reliability stood the test of this grueling race, leaving us with nothing but confidence in its performance. For anyone seeking a mounting solution that meets rigorous demands, this double socket arm is undoubtedly a standout choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made, Solid
reviews.reviewText: It works as described, quality is achieved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RAM is awesome
reviews.reviewText: As I have purchased several components which are used together, I am reviewing them as a group and repeating the review across all. My time with the product is still very short, I can only provide my initial impressions. RAM products are ASTOUNDING! They do tend to be a bit on the higher end of the spectrum for this type of product; however, the old adage "you get what you pay for" definitely holds in this case. The things I love about this group of products:1 - Once the devices are in place and tightened down, they are stable. There is minimal vibration; and, it does not swivel around when putting the phone in the cradle.2 - The X configuration of the cradle grip allows for maximum air flow around the phone. My previous phone suffered overheating damage from being in a cradle in the sun for an extended trip. The RAM components not only allow for more air flow but the long arm brings the unit further into the car, just past the rear-view mirror, minimizing the amount of direct sun exposure during the hottest times of the day.3 - This is the EASIEST cradle I have owned for getting the phone in and out. I have the LG G3 currently.I currently own two sets of this product. One for each vehicle. The LG G3 with a case is a bit of a tight fit in the phone grip cradle. It is not horrible; but, I have to put it in on an angle then straighten it. I have purchased the larger grip version for the second. It is much easier to get the phone in and out. I have not yet seen a down side to the larger vs normal. I will keep you posted......

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent part of the Ram Mount Sytem
reviews.reviewText: I had these mounts set up to hold my phone for navigation in off road sport riding in my side by side. I found them to be very sturdy, with no shaking or coming loose even with the extreme bumps, slides, rock crawling, and racing. If these mounts can hold up to my kind of riding, they can hold up to anything. If you are considering these for an automobile, you will NOT have any problems with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works As Advertised
reviews.reviewText: RAM mounts work great. They are a bit pricey but they last for years. I have had quite a few different mounts on my boat from RAM and years later still work as well as they were when new. You should buy according to RAM recommendations for the weight of what it is you are going to mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best overall length for me
reviews.reviewText: I ordered all 3 lengths to try in my application, and while they would have all worked, this was the best choice. It was also the most stable and easiest to control while loose.
Me faltaba para completar mi configuracion. Excelente servicio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've wondered for a while about raising my Tomtom on a longer arm, I have been using the original arm supplied with a Tomtom. The new arm is robust and works (fits) fine and the spring loading makes it easier to attach to the ball mounts than the original - that is too short for a spring.However, on my MC - due to the ball mount/clocks/screen position - I could not position the longer arm and Tomtom in a suitable way for ease of reading. This is not a problem with the arm, it's a layout thing.

Comme beaucoup de produits RAM, c'est parfait, ça fait le boulot et ça ne bouge pas dans le temps. Fixé sur mon Tiger il supporte mon smartphone durcit tous les jours de toute l'année, par tous les temps. Pluies, grêles, vents, il n'a pas bougé et mon smartphone est encore en vie...
